title: BiDi
summary: BiDi (BiDirectional) refers to a document containing both right-to-left and left-to-right text. Even when both directionalities occur in the same paragraph, the text in each language must appear in its proper directionality.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
